answers.description: Personal-use MCP server for Claude Desktop providing professional-grade stock analysis and technical indicators
problems: Stock analysis workflows are fragmented across multiple tools and tabs
Repeatable screening and indicator analysis is time-consuming to reproduce manually
Portfolio tracking and performance context are often disconnected from analysis
target_users: Primary: repo owner using Claude Desktop for investing research
Secondary: advanced retail investors and technical-analysis oriented traders
key_goals: Fast, reliable stock analysis via stable MCP tools
Accurate and reproducible indicator and screening outputs
Practical portfolio visibility (positions, cost basis, P&L, correlations)
Graceful degradation when optional providers are unavailable
answers.infrastructure: Local dev via Makefile; Docker optional; Claude Desktop via mcp-remote bridge
